verses.name: Matthew 23:37
verses.text: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thou that killest the prophets, and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings, and ye would not!

verses.name: Matthew 23:38
verses.text: Behold, your house is left unto you desolate.

verses.name: Matthew 23:39
verses.text: For I say unto you, Ye shall not see me henceforth, till ye shall say, Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord.
